動物用藥品名稱: 龍馬躍三效貓瘟、疱疹病毒、卡里西病毒活毒混合疫苗
業者名稱: 台灣龍馬躍股份有限公司
效能(適應症): 貓：預防貓瘟、疱疹病毒及卡里西病毒感染。
成分: 每一劑量LEUCORIFELIN含有：-FELINIFFA(P)冷凍乾燥疫苗：INFECTIOUS PANLEUCOPENIA VIRUS (PLI-IV strain), AT LEAST.......10^3 CCID50FREEZE-DRYINE EXCIPIENT. Q.S................1 DOSE-CORIFFLIN (HC)液態疫苗：HERPESVIRUS VIRAL FRACTION (C27 strain), AT LEAST........200 RID UNITSPURIFIED CALICIVIRUS(FCV 255 strain), AT LEAST.............5 MCGMERTHIOLATE, AT MOST...............0.1 MGOIL EXCIPLENT, Q.S.................1 ML
